articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Fauci says pandemic exposed 'undeniable effects of racism' - NBC News
articles.description: Anthony Fauci said Sunday “the undeniable effects of racism” have led to unacceptable health disparities for African Americans, Hispanics and Native Americans.
articles.content: ATLANTA The immunologist who leads the Covid-19 response in the United States said Sunday that the undeniable effects of racism have led to unacceptable health disparities that especially hurt Africa… [+2018 chars]

articles.title: China Covid cover-up efforts 'staggering' blasts Mike Pompeo amid 'bio-weapon' warning - Daily Express

articles.title: Gunning for the BMW GS: Harley-Davidson launches Pan America, and its headed for SA - News24

articles.content:
